content: **this pattern is part of the summer 2024 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** one size **finished measurements ** 168cm / 66 wingspan 79cm / 31 deep at centre point **materials ** hobbii unicorn solid 75% wool 25% polyamide 100 g 3 5 oz = 400 m 437 yds shade mustard 20 3 skeins **needles ** 3 5mm / us e crochet hook always use a hook size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 21 sts and 9 row = 10cm / 4 square in pattern after blocking **pattern information ** grisaille is worked in row from the top down in an all-over reversible leaf pattern shawl is worked as a half square with a column of shell motifs at the center back picots are worked along the bottom edge **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2
